metadata.title: CVE-2017-13194 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A vulnerability in the Android media framework (libvpx) related to oddframe width. Product: Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0, 8.1.Android ID: A-64710201.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13194` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx5 - 1.7.0-3
vpx-tools - 1.7.0-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvpx package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.0-3').
